explanation: [0-0] In the garage of a fire station, two firefighters in dark uniforms with red stripes on their chests stand in front of a red fire truck. The firefighter on the left holds a roll of white gauze and a round red object in each hand, smiling at the front. The firefighter on the right smiles at the front. Behind them is a fire truck, and other fire trucks and equipment can be seen.

[0-6] Then, the firefighter on the left throws the red object in his hand behind him, turns to the right, takes out the gauze, and begins to skillfully bandage the arm of the firefighter on the right. The firefighter on the right looks down at the left with a smile, and the firefighter on the left looks down, wrapping the gauze around the arm of the firefighter on the right.

[0-6] Then, the firefighter on the left throws the red object in his hand behind him, turns to the right, takes out the gauze, and begins to skillfully bandage the arm of the firefighter on the right. The firefighter on the right looks down at the left with a smile, and the firefighter on the left looks down, wrapping the gauze around the arm of the firefighter on the right.

[0-6] Then, the firefighter on the left throws the red object in his hand behind him, turns to the right, takes out the gauze, and begins to skillfully bandage the arm of the firefighter on the right. The firefighter on the right looks down at the left with a smile, and the firefighter on the left looks down, wrapping the gauze around the arm of the firefighter on the right.

The firefighter on the right looks down at the left with a smile, and the firefighter on the left looks down, wrapping the gauze around the arm of the firefighter on the right.

[0-6] Then, the firefighter on the left throws the red object in his hand behind him, turns to the right, takes out the gauze, and begins to skillfully bandage the arm of the firefighter on the right. The firefighter on the right looks down at the left with a smile, and the firefighter on the left looks down, wrapping the gauze around the arm of the firefighter on the right.

[0-6] Then, the firefighter on the left throws the red object in his hand behind him, turns to the right, takes out the gauze, and begins to skillfully bandage the arm of the firefighter on the right. The firefighter on the right looks down at the left with a smile, and the firefighter on the left looks down, wrapping the gauze around the arm of the firefighter on the right.

[6-13] Subsequently, the firefighter on the left stretches out his left hand on the opened gauze, pulls the gauze with his right hand, bypasses his left arm from under the right firefighter's arm, then lifts his left arm, opens his five fingers, and a circle appears in the gauze in his left hand. After that, he lifts the gauze in his right hand, picks up the gauze in his right hand with his left hand, passes it through the circle, and ties a knot on the arm of the firefighter on the right. Then, the firefighter on the left takes the gauze with his right hand and wraps it downwards, continuing to tie the knot with both hands, and stuffs the remaining gauze under the knot. Finally, he tidies up the bandaged gauze with both hands, looks at the firefighter on the right raising both arms, the firefighter on the right puts his left hand on his right arm, and looks at the firefighter on the left.
